frontmatter.title: Gentle Understanding of Fully Convolutional Networks

markdownRemark.html:
In this post, you will see my mental model of the fundamental neural network architectures. We will look at the main idea and general structures of a fully connected network or commonly known as a Multilayer Perception, a convolution with fully connected network, and finally a fully convolutional network. These three types of networks shows the evolution of architectures used in image classification, with increasing improvements in results. I find the use of fully convolutional network for semantic segmentation a very cool topic so I will focus on that in this post. I hope that you will see that a fully convolutional network is really a build-on to earlier models.
